info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 23 at 6:22PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Wasatch and central Utah Counties through 715 PM MDT... At 622 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Vineyard, or 8 miles west of Provo, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Weather station reported. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Provo, Payson, Heber City, Orem, Lehi, Spanish Fork, Pleasant Grove, Springville, American Fork, Eagle Mountain, Heber, Lindon, Mapleton, Salem, Daniel, Vineyard, Brigham Young University, Wasatch Mountain State Park, Palmyra and Lake Shore. This includes the following highways... Interstate 15 between mile markers 251 and 279. US Route 6 between mile markers 174 and 177. US Route 40 between mile markers 8 and 36. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
